content.rendered:
Shipping / Service Delivery Policy

We offer free shipping PAN India on orders above 1800/-. The minimum shipping charges will be rs 70 and will vary according to the weight of products .

Important Update : Delivery time is 8-10 working days approximately .You’ll get the tracking Id within 3-5 days you place the order.

*Due to the Covid-19 pandemic, there might be slight unforeseen delays from courier companies end and we apologise for the same. We will try our level best to get the product delivered to you at the mentioned timeline.

In case of any urgent shipment, you can contact us directly on Instagram or whatsapp .
